resources.string: Registering\nPlease wait a moment, contacting Push to register your device.
Connecting Google Account\n\nThis may take a few minutes. Make sure you are connected to the internet and have an active Google account on your device.
Contacting Push\n\nWe are contacting the Push server to remove this device from your account.
You have installed the maximum number of packs. If you need more, please contact support@ilhasoft.com.br.
Push is active and relaying messages to your account. Tap to pause Push.
Push is paused and will not relay messages to your account. Tap to resume Push.
Push is unable to connect to the internet. Make sure you are connected to WiFi and that your mobile data is enabled. If problems persist, try rebooting your device.

Push is experiencing problems sending SMS messages. This may be a temporary problem with your network or may be an indication that your SIM is out of credit. Messages will be retried, but if problems persist, check your phone\'s credit or try rebooting your device.
Push is active and relaying messages.
The default method to use when delivering messages. Push will back down to other methods if it encounters a network error.
Whether SMS messages should be deleted automatically from the inbox after they are sent to Push.
